modMetaData.name: Spidercamp's Horses
modMetaData.author: Spidercamp
modMetaData.description:
Brings horses to the rim.
Features: Horses are fast and strong fighters Some horses are beautiful and improve the beauty of the surrounding area. All horses have advanced trainable intelligence.
Optional Features: Patched for (and recommended in conjunction with) with Giddy-up Core/Combat: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1216999901 Patched for A Dog Said
